translation.headerDescription: I am a Full Stack developer with experience in web application development. I am passionate about frontend development, UI/UX and learning new technologies.
translation.aboutDescription: I graduated as a Computer Systems Engineer from the Instituto Tecnológico de Nuevo Laredo. Currently, I am dedicated to full-stack web development and work to create custom solutions to meet specific customer needs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Ready to take your business to the next level? Contact me today and let's start working together.
contact.businessHours: Business Hours: Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM and Saturdays from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM (CST)
